Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show two students using a string telephone to communicate, with each holding one cup to their ear or mouth.
The student can illustrate that the string is tightened between the two cups to ensure sound travels effectively.
The student can demonstrate the use of materials (like cups and string) in the drawing, as provided in the task.
The student can depict the string telephone as a device that sends or receives sound over a distance.
The student can show how the sound travels through the string from one student to the other.
The student can explain through their drawing how this technology helps people communicate when far apart.
